item.title: CharacterBank announces online multiplayer action RPG Knights of Fiona for SteamVR, Quest
item.content:encoded:
RUINSMAGUS developer CharacterBank has announced Knights of Fiona, an online multiplayer action RPG coming to SteamVR and Quest in 2026.

Here is an overview of the game, via CharacterBank:

About

Fierce dragons have emerged in the land of Gallia. Join Fiona and her sworn knights to protect the kingdom! Embark on quests solo or with friends as you fight against the darkness.

Knights of Fiona brings players to the vibrant world of Gallia, where they join Fiona and her sworn knights to fight against an ancient evil threatening the safety of the realm. Players can adventure either solo or with up to two friends as they embark on this epic quest.

Key Features

  • A Deep Character-Driven Story – Enjoy a hand crafted narrative experience. Interact with a deep roster of unique NPCs, pushing the limit of what is possible in virtual reality.
  • Live Your Fantasy – Explore the city of Gallia from its train station to seaside ports. Adventure throughout the lands as you battle against hordes of enemies.
  • Epic Boss Battles – Restore hope to the land as your battle fierce dragons and other creatures.

item.title: Co-op creature collector action RPG KinForge announced for PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Potential console releases to follow.

Seeker Entertainment, an independent studio composed of veteran developers from major publishers including Blizzard Entertainment, Maxis, Riot Games, and Sony Online Entertainment, has announced cooperative creature collector action RPG KinForge. It is still in early development and will launch first for PC via Steam, followed by potential console releases.

“We started Seeker with a simple belief: games can do more than entertain,” said Seeker Entertainment co-founder and CEO Oksana Kubushyna in a press release. “They can connect, inspire, and restore. KinForge is built on that idea. It’s a world where players don’t fight for glory alone. They fight together to push back corruption and restore balance. It’s a game about cooperation, courage, and hope.”

Seeker Entertainment co-founder and chief corporate officer Travis McGeathy added, “Oksana and I bonded over a shared goal to create something truly new. Something hopeful, but not cozy. KinForge builds on pieces from our favorite games, combining the mastery-driven intensity of action RPGs with the emotional depth of creature collectors, all wrapped in the social DNA that made games like EverQuest timeless. At its heart, it’s a story about redemption.”

  • ❮
  • ❯

Here is an overview of the game, via Seeker Entertainment:

About

KinForge is a cooperative, creature-collector action RPG where every fusion of powers creates new experiences, wild combos, and the strength to fight against spreading Corruption. Forge bonds with Ancient Elementals, beings of the Mystic Realm, and restore a world on the brink of collapse.

Nature Has Had Enough

In a world much like ours, Elementals are the invisible hand of nature itself. They breathe life into the wind, guide the tides, and spark the fires that sustain the world. Humanity discovered how to enslave them, harnessing their power to fuel modern technology and industry. But forced servitude drove them mad. Corrupted and broken, they turned against the natural order, and the balance of the world began to collapse. Storms now rage unchecked, forests rot, and the planet itself rebels.

You are one of the rare few chosen by the Ancient Elementals to help restore what has been lost. Bond with these living powers, wield their abilities, and lead the fight to heal a planet on the brink of destruction.

Bond With Living Powers

Elementals are not tools. They are living forces with purpose, emotion, and will. Cleanse corrupted spirits and form lasting bonds with the ones you save. Each Ancient Elemental you befriend grants a new ability to wield in battle, from searing bolts of flame to barriers of living stone. Lesser spirits, known as Sprites, can then be woven into those abilities, twisting and amplifying their effects. Create an experience that feels entirely your own by finding the perfect pairing between Sprites and Ancients.

Every fusion changes how you fight. The right pairing might turn a fire blast into a homing inferno or cause a simple strike to erupt in a storm of lightning and ash. With billions of potential combinations, the line between chaos and mastery blurs and the most chaotic combinations often become the most brilliant.

Fight Alone or Together

Play solo or with up to three others. Venture into corrupted regions, rescue lost spirits, and confront the human Overseers who twisted nature for profit. Every Elemental you save adds new possibilities, empowering you to push further against the spreading Corruption.

Your Preserve, Your Sanctuary

Between missions, return to your Preserve, a living refuge where you and your allies regroup and rebuild. Reincarnate fallen Elementals, craft new ability kits, and construct upgrades that strengthen your campaign.

Worlds Reforged

Every campaign begins fresh, shaped by an Overseer whose power defines the challenges ahead. Each new journey is procedurally generated and seeded with the Elementals, enemies, and upgrades you’ve already unlocked, allowing new discoveries to emerge from what came before. Over time, your growing collection transforms not just how you play, but the worlds themselves.

Key Features

  • 10-Hour Campaigns – Each campaign centers on a powerful Overseer whose influence defines enemies, environments, and challenges.
  • Enduring Progression – Every campaign begins fresh but carries forward everything you have unlocked previously. New Elementals, bosses, and relics await discovery.
  • Mission-Based Adventures – Short, focused missions keep every session meaningful while feeding into the larger restoration effort.
  • Grow Between Missions – Strengthen bonds, craft upgrades, and prepare for what comes next.
  • Procedural Replayability – Maps, enemies, and the Overseer’s tactics shift each run, ensuring every campaign feels distinct.

KinForge is a standalone, cooperative action RPG about connection, courage, and renewal. Built around 100+ hours of handcrafted and procedural content, it offers deep replayability without live-service grind.

item.title: Vampire Survivors VR announced for Quest 3, now available
item.content:encoded:
• Quest

It's Vampire Survivors, but in virtual reality.

poncle has announced Vampire Survivors VR, a virtual reality version of the roguelite action game for Quest 3. It is available now via Meta Store for $9.99 / £7.99 / €9.99.

Here is an overview of the game, via poncle:

About

Vampire Survivors VR is a time survival game with minimalistic gameplay and roguelite elements, except now, it’s in Virtual Reality!

Hell is empty, the devils are here, and there’s no place to run or hide. All you can do is survive as long as you can until death inevitably puts an end to your struggles. Gather gold in each run to buy upgrades and help the next survivor.

Slay hordes of monsters while seated or standing in dioramic 3D voxel created environments of the Mad Forest, Inlaid Library, Dairy Plant and more.

Also includes Vampire Survivors: Legacy of the Moonspell and Vampire Survivors: Tides of the Foscari.

The supernatural indie phenomenon that lets you be the bullet hell, on your face!

Starting Tips:

  • Take your time to grab gems and items, they won’t disappear.
  • Get two or three offensive weapons at first, but focus on leveling them up one at a time.
  • Armor and Luck are good starting power-ups to spend money on.
  • Refund power-ups often, it’s free, and try new upgrade paths.
